description: Goh`s Golbat was caught in the Seafoam Islands in the Kanto region. Goh was traversing a rock bridge in the mountains when the Golbat appeared and attacked. Ash Ketchum was going to battle it with Pikachu`s Thunderbolt but Goh stopped him and threw a Pok√© Ball with a Nice throw to capture it.
name: Golbat (Gou)
